sense.def:
An occasion
je čas, ko se nekaj zgodi.

seg.quote: I met him only on one occasion.

sense.def:
An occasion
je tudi pomemben dogodek, obred ali slavje.

seg.quote: They have the date fixed for the big occasion.

sense.def:
An occasion for doing something
je primeren trenutek, da nekaj naredimo;

seg.quote: For the girls, nature study was an occasion for lazy walks and idle picnics.
He had never had occasion to use his gun.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja
on occasion
ali
on occasions
, se zgodi včasih, a ne zelo pogosto;

seg.quote: You have on occasions surprised people.

sense.def:
To occasion something
pomeni biti vzrok za nekaj;
